body: Isadora is technically a loli like any girl who doesn't look more than 12 years old in body, but I understand your point. Personally, I prefer Illya-style lolis.

As a lolicon, this isn't a loli any more. Louis are a wee bit taller and this ..... this girl is just a baby some may say better and some may say eww but you have your preferences (on this site not in real like)
